thread.title: Adidas Yeezy Runner Unveiled At Yeezy Season 5 Show
thread.title_full: Adidas Yeezy Runner Unveiled At Yeezy Season 5 Show

author: Kyle Rooney
title: Adidas Yeezy Runner Unveiled At Yeezy Season 5 Show
text:
Home > Sneakers > Adidas Yeezy Runner Unveiled At Yeezy Season 5 Show Adidas Yeezy Runner Unveiled At Yeezy Season 5 Show 2 3 Posted by Kyle Rooney , Feb 15, 2017 at 04:19pm Preview two colorways of the Yeezy Runner. 
Kanye West 's Yeezy Season 5 show just wrapped up in New York City and it featured the mysterious sneaker, reportedly dubbed the "Yeezy Runner," that has been spotted on the feet of Kanye himself as recently as last night. 
The kicks were first spotted in early January but resurfaced again yesterday in a white/gum color scheme when Kanye and Kim stepped out for Valentine's Day. 
At today's show, three versions of the Yeezy Runner were on display, including the grey/teal/orange joint which appeared in January, as well as white/teal and "triple black" renditions. 
Release details and pricing have yet to be announced. 
Check out some early on foot images from Kanye's Yeezy Season 5 show below, courtesy of @IBNJasper and @Upscale_Vandal . A post shared by Yeezy Mafia (@yeezymafia) on Feb 15, 2017 at 1:22pm PST A post shared by Yeezy Mafia (@yeezymafia) on Feb 15, 2017 at 1:18pm PST 
< class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 15, 2017 at 04:19pm 2K Views
